name: Manager can be Tough!: Case of the Kidnapped Waitress
name_original: Manager can be Tough!: Case of the Kidnapped Waitress
description:
OVERVIEW

Hack and slash through hordes of beasts and powerful boss enemies as a sexy costume clad café manager on a mission to save her kidnapped employee!
Use up to three weapons at once to attack, guard, and combo to wipe out large groups of enemies, or deal massive damage to bosses with this simple to pick up yet satisfying combat system.
Collect new weapons, power ups, and costumes as you progress, then put your skills to test in 1v1 battles against side-characters in the unlockable arena mode!

STORY

In a fantasy world where humans and mythical creatures live tenuously side-by-side, a busty, weapon-savvy cafe manager springs into action when one of her employees is kidnapped by a gang of goblins. Can she safely fight her way through the lawless land of wild beats, orcs, and dragons to rescue her star waitress?
Or will she herself fall into the hands of evil as well...?

ARENA MODE


Clear the game once to unlock area mode! Select your fighter, choose their outfit, then begin fighting your way through increasingly difficult one-on-one matches, and 4 way multi-character brawls!
Each fighter has their own unique special ability and basic weapons, so have fun learning the unique attacks, strengths, and weaknesses of them all!

FEATURES


  • 9 weapons to find and collect including a bastard sword, axe, spear, machine gun, grenade launcher and more!
  • 3 costumes: Maid clothes, athletic wear, or bunny girl outfit.
  • Wide variety of enemies including dragon dogs, goblins, orcs, Minotaur, spiders, worms, frogs, bees, land dragons, and more.
  • Unlockable Arena Mode with 6 different characters and progressively harder 1v1 and free for all matches.
  • Adjustable difficulty which when set to higher than normal gives enemies the ability to learn and counter your play-style.
  • Editable key mapping and controller support for a customized game experience .
